title: Not without Val
creator_credit: Vin Shelly, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
brief_description: Vin Shelly has served the Shire of Chiltern for 20 years, and was shire president for three terms. He shares some of his interests over the years, as well as his main source of pride, the family farm.
creator_credit_for_label: Vin Shelly, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
